Todoist Advanced
data.description: TODOIST ADVANCED is the original and best-supported dark/custom skin generator for Todoist. It's been tested on the Todoist platform up to version 978. Latest mod: customizable motivational tagline, tag font color and logo color options! Todoist Advanced offers a fully integrated and optimised dark theme with many additional configuration options should you wish to add your own styling. To change the main colours, switch skins to OFF and choose your colours from the MAIN COLORS etc. The default install of Midnight has priority left-border enabled, 4 priority colors (RYBG), default label (circle - transparent), wide screen, edge shadows, custom scrollbars (new), and the Carto texture. If you need any new settings, let me know. Hit 'Customize Settings' above to access your style goodies.

data.name: GitLab Dark (maxigaz)
data.description: A dark theme for GitLab, developed specifically for Stylus. For the latest version and reporting issues, please, visit its repository on GitLab. If you report issues here on userstyles.org, I may not see it.

data.name: YTS Night Mode
Global Dark/Transparent
data.description:
A heavily modified version of the "Global Dark" theme.
I loved it as it was but it felt very barebones to a degree.
I went through the code over the course of a year every time I noticed something that was off.
My solution to every "off" element was to make it transparent in contrasting degrees.

Example: A foreground 25% transparency against a 75% bg transparency created depth.

The only issue that arose after making practically everything transparent was finding a background that wouldn't make text unreadable on certain websites.

After using stock images to make several backgrounds that worked well I finally found a format/formula for taking any image and using it as a proper background for the theme.

If you use/like/enjoy this style but discover an issue where an element is improperly displayed or to request a background that works with the theme from your source image please feel free to contact me at: flapthejax@gmail.com 

Enjoy.
